message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split in my favor. It benefits us both to settle this quickly due to inflation.
Let's meet in the middle, 55 for me, 45 for you. Inflation is costing us both.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll agree to your previous offer, but with me taking the 55% share.  Time is money - literally!
I understand time is money, but I'm not giving up yet. 57 for me, 43 for you. Inflation hurts you more than me.
